body_html:
Cool. Numpy's conservative diophantine solver seems to check the reasonable cases quickly. Maybe could be used.

https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/master/numpy/core/src/private/mem_overlap.c#L756

They use this before every array assignment that looks like it might alias, for example

https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/master/numpy/core/src/multiarray/array_assign_array.c#L297

body:
Cool.  Numpy's conservative diophantine solver seems to check the reasonable cases quickly.  Maybe could be used.

https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/master/numpy/core/src/private/mem_overlap.c#L756

They use this before every array assignment that looks like it might alias, for example

https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/master/numpy/core/src/multiarray/array_assign_array.c#L297
